info.instructions: This tutorial demonstrates the score_gt validation feature for listwise evaluation.

data.src: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
tgt: Rychlá hnědá liška skáče přes líného psa.
Hbitá hnědá liška přeskočila lenivého psa.
data.instructions: Tutorial 1: Compare translations. Translation A is best and must score higher than B. Translation B is good and must score higher than C.

validation.warning: Translation A must score higher than B (score_gt: 1).
Translation B must score higher than C (score_gt: 2).

data.instructions: Attention Check: Translation A has a major error (UI instead of AI), so B must score higher than A.

validation.warning: Attention check failed: A has error, score 20-40.
Attention check failed: B is correct and must score higher than A (score_gt: 0).

data.src: Climate change affects global weather patterns.
tgt: Změny klimatu ovlivňují globální vzorce počasí.
Klima změna má vliv na svět počasí systémy.
data.instructions: Tutorial 2: Translation A is better than B. Ensure A scores higher.

validation.warning: Translation A must score 75-95 and higher than B.

data.instructions: Tutorial: A is excellent, B is okay, C is poor. A > B > C.

validation.warning: A is excellent (85-100) and must score higher than B.
B is okay (55-75) and must score higher than C.

data.instructions: Attention Check: A is perfect, B is acceptable. A must be higher.

validation.warning: Attention check: A is perfect (90-95) and must score higher than B.
